entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog developing this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Forecast issued 7:40 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 7:40 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:40 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
